content:
A popular gaming reference!

In the Halo video game series, "Halo" refers to a ring-shaped alien structure that serves as the main setting for the first game. The Covenant, a powerful alien alliance, has built the Halos across the galaxy to preserve life by harnessing and destroying all organic life in the universe.

The games follow Master Chief Petty Officer John-117, a super-soldier equipped with advanced combat armor and abilities, as he battles against the Covenant to save humanity from extinction.

Are you a Halo fan?
